name: octal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
using a system of numbers that uses only the numbers 0 to 7: Binary is easily converted to the octal numeral system. The permission information is stored as four octal digits, each specifying a different set of permissions.
More examplesFewer examplesBinary 000 is equivalent to the octal digit 0, binary 111 is equivalent to octal 7, and so forth.It is always advisable to prefix the 0 to specify that your number is octal.Later improvements allowed octal, decimal, or hexadecimal representation of the binary strings.
